sentence.Network_en: An unexpectedly large fraction of players acted altruistically to protect their weaker friends.
sentence.Network_cn: 远远超出人们的预料,有很大一部分玩家在游戏中无私地保护那些弱者朋友.

sentences.sentence: "he acted selflessly when he helped the old lady in distress"

auth_sentence.content: Even if a race were altruistically motivated to send us new technology, we must determine protocols to safely use it.

auth_sentence.content: More altruistically, I was familiar with the Olympic site before it became the Olympic site.
